member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout
member.summary: Specifies the DashboardLayout component.
Specifies the DashboardLayout component.
Specifies the DashboardLayout component.

The DashboardLayout is a grid structured layout component, that helps to create a dashboard with panels. Panels hold the UI components or data to be visualized with flexible options like resize, reorder, drag-n-drop, remove and add, that allows users to easily place the panels at a desired position within the grid layout.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Override the initialized method to customize the component at server side. Method invoked when the component is ready to start.

member.summary: Method invoked when any changes in component state occurs.

member.summary: Method invoked after each time the component has been rendered.

member.summary: Sets id attribute for the dashboard element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.ChildContent
member.summary: Specifies the child content.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.AllowDragging
member.summary: If allowDragging is set to true, then the DashboardLayout allows you to drag and reorder the panels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.AllowFloating
member.summary: If allowFloating is set to true, then the DashboardLayout will automatically move the panels upwards to fill the empty available cells while dragging or resizing the panels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.AllowResizing
member.summary: If allowResizing is set to true, then the DashboardLayout allows you to resize the panels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.CellAspectRatio
member.summary: Defines the cell aspect ratio of the panel.

member.summary: Defines the spacing between the panels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.Columns
member.summary: Defines the number of columns to be created in the DashboardLayout.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.DraggableHandle
member.summary: Defines the draggable handle selector which will act as dragging handler for the panels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.MediaQuery
member.summary: Defines the media query value where the dashboardlayout becomes stacked layout when the resolution meets.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfDashboardLayout.DashboardHtmlAttributes

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents
member.summary: Configure the event handlers to handle the events with Splitter component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.Parent
member.summary: The splitter is a layout user interface (UI) component that splits the layout into multiple panes with resizable and collapsible support.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.OnCollapse
member.summary: Triggers on collapsing the panes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.OnExpand
member.summary: Triggers on expanding the panes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.Collapsed
member.summary: Triggers when the panes get collapsed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.Created
member.summary: Triggers after creating the splitter component with its panes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.Expanded
member.summary: Triggers when the panes get expanded.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.OnResizeStart
member.summary: Triggers when the split pane is started to resize.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.OnResizeStop
member.summary: Triggers when the resizing of split pane is stopped.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.Destroyed
member.summary: The event triggers when the splitter is destroyed with its elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterEvents.Resizing
member.summary: Triggers when a split pane is being resized.

members.member:
Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
/// A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane
member.summary: Configure each pane and its properties to handle the pane behavior.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.ChildContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the splitter pane element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.ContentTemplate
member.summary: Defines the pane content as a template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Collapsed
member.summary: Specifies whether a pane is collapsed on the initial rendering of the splitter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.CollapsedChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback of the bound value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Collapsible
member.summary: Specifies whether a pane is capable to collapse.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Content
member.summary: Specifies the content of the split pane.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.CssClass
member.summary: One or more custom CSS classes can be specified to the Splitter panes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Max
member.summary: Specifies the maximum size of a pane. The pane cannot be resized more than the specified maximum limit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.MaxChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback of the bound value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Min
member.summary: Specifies the minimum size of a pane. The pane cannot be resized less than the specified minimum size.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.MinChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback of the bound value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Resizable
member.summary: Specifies the value whether a pane is resizable or not. By default, the Splitter panes are resizable. You can disable resize functionality for any specific panes using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Size
member.summary: SizeConfigures the properties for each pane. For horizontal splitter, the size act as width. For vertical splitter, the size act as height.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.SizeChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback of the bound value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.Visible
member.summary: Specifies the value that represents whether the pane is visible.
member.remarks: If this property is set to `false`, the pane element will not be shown in the DOM. This property can be used to provide conditional pane rendering in Splitter.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Dispose the unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter
member.summary: The splitter is a layout user interface (UI) component that splits the layout into multiple panes with resizable and collapsible support.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.OnParametersSetAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component has received parameters from its parent.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.OnAfterRenderAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method invoked after each time the component has been rendered.
member.param: Set to true if this is the first time OnAfterRender(Boolean) has been invoked.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.ID
member.summary: Specifies the unique identifier.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.ChildContent
member.summary: Sets the content for panes of the Splitter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class names that defines specific user-defined styles and themes to be appended on the root element of the Splitter. It is used to customize the Splitter component. One or more custom CSS classes can be specified to the Splitter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.EnableReversePanes
member.summary: Specifies the value whether splitter panes are reordered or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in the right to left (RTL) direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.Enabled
member.summary: Specifies a Boolean value that indicates whether the component is enabled or disabled.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enables or disables the persisting component's state between page reloads. If enabled, the pane settings of Splitter is persisted.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the Splitter component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.Orientation
member.summary: Specifies a value that indicates whether to align the split panes horizontally or vertically. Set the orientation property as "Horizontal" to create a horizontal splitter that aligns the panes left-to-right. Set the orientation property as "Vertical" to create a vertical splitter that aligns the panes top-to-bottom.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.Width
member.summary: Specifies the width of the Splitter component. The value can be either in pixel or percentage format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: You can add the additional Html attributes such as id, title, etc., to the splitter element.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.AddPane(Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to add a pane dynamically to the specified index position by passing the pane properties.
member.param: Specifies the pane's properties that apply to new pane.
Specifies the index where the pane will be inserted.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.CollapseAsync(System.Double)
member.summary: Collapses corresponding pane based on the index is passed.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.
member.param: Specifies the index value of the corresponding pane to be collapsed.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.ExpandAsync(System.Double)
member.summary: Expands the corresponding pane based on the index is passed.
member.param: Specifies the index value of the corresponding pane to be Expanded.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.RemovePane(System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to remove the specified pane dynamically by passing its index value.
member.param: Specifies the index value to remove the corresponding pane.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.AddPaneAsync(Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SplitterPane,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to add a pane dynamically to the specified index position by passing the pane properties.
member.param: Specifies the pane's properties that apply to new pane.
Specifies the index where the pane will be inserted.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.RemovePaneAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to remove the specified pane dynamically by passing its index value.
member.param: Specifies the index value to remove the corresponding pane.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.SfSplitter.ToggleAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double})
member.summary: Expand and Collapse the Splitter panes based on the given indexes.
member.remarks: This method allows us to collapse and expand the multiple panes from the application end with a single method call.
member.param: Specifies the indexes of the corresponding panes to be Expanded.
Specifies the indexes of the corresponding panes to be Collapsed.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Method invoked after component has been created.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel
member.summary: Interface for a class PaneProperties.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.Collapsed
member.summary: Specifies whether a pane is collapsed on the initial rendering of the splitter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.Collapsible
member.summary: Specifies whether a pane is capable to collapse.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.Content
member.summary: Specifies the content of the split pane.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class names that defines specific user-defined styles and themes to be appended on the corresponding pane of the Splitter. It is used to customize the Splitter component panes. One or more custom CSS classes can be specified to the Splitter panes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.Max
member.summary: Specifies the maximum size of a pane. The pane cannot be resized more than the specified maximum limit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.Min
member.summary: Specifies the minimum size of a pane. The pane cannot be resized less than the specified minimum size.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.Resizable
member.summary: Specifies the value whether a pane is resizable or not. By default, the Splitter panes are resizable. You can disable resize functionality for any specific panes using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.PanePropertiesModel.Size
member.summary: Configures the properties for each pane. For horizontal splitter, the size act as width. For vertical splitter, the size act as height.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.Internal.PaneSetting
member.summary: Specifies PaneSettings value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.Internal.PaneSetting.Collapsed
member.summary: Specifies whether a pane is collapsed on the initial rendering of the splitter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.Internal.PaneSetting.Max
member.summary: Specifies the maximum size of a pane. The pane cannot be resized more than the specified maximum limit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.Internal.PaneSetting.Min
member.summary: Specifies the minimum size of a pane. The pane cannot be resized less than the specified minimum size.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.Internal.PaneSetting.Size
member.summary: Configures the properties for each pane. For horizontal splitter, the size act as width. For vertical splitter, the size act as height.

member.summary: Defines the splitter pane.

member.summary: Specifies the current pane index.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Layouts.Internal.Pane.PaneSetting
member.summary: Defines the PaneSettings.
